name: Spirit
description: A common ghost that is generally less aggressive than most, but can become more active over time.
ability: No unique ability but hunts regularly.
weakness: Incense stops it from hunting for longer than other ghosts (180 seconds vs 90).

name: Wraith
description: A supernatural entity that can teleport to players and phase through walls. Very dangerous.
ability: Can teleport to a random player, causing an EMF reading at that location.
weakness: Cannot step in salt and will never leave UV footprints in it.

name: Phantom
description: A ghost that drains sanity quickly when looked at and can possess the living.
ability: Looking at a Phantom drains sanity faster. Disappears when photographed during a ghost event.
weakness: Taking a photo of it during a ghost event will cause it to disappear temporarily.

name: Poltergeist
description: A mischievous ghost known for throwing and manipulating multiple objects at once.
ability: Can throw multiple objects simultaneously. Throwing objects decreases nearby players' sanity.
weakness: Is almost ineffective in an empty room with no objects to throw.

name: Banshee
description: A singing ghost that stalks and targets one player at a time relentlessly.
ability: Targets and hunts only one player at a time. Emits a unique shriek on the Parabolic Microphone.
weakness: The Crucifix has an increased effective range (5m vs 3m).

name: Jinn
description: A territorial ghost that travels faster when its target is far away. Feeds on electricity.
ability: Moves significantly faster when chasing a player who is far away. Can instantly drop sanity.
weakness: Cannot use its ability if the location's fuse box is off.

name: Mare
description: A ghost that thrives in darkness and becomes more aggressive when lights are off.
ability: Has an increased chance to hunt in the dark. Will try to turn lights off more often.
weakness: Turning on lights will reduce its chance to attack. Has a higher hunt threshold in light (40%).

name: Revenant
description: A slow ghost that becomes extremely fast when it spots a player during a hunt.
ability: Moves at double speed when it sees a player during a hunt (3m/s vs 1.5m/s).
weakness: Moves very slowly when not chasing a player (1m/s). Hiding makes it slow down.

name: Shade
description: A shy ghost that is less active when players are nearby. Prefers to stay hidden.
ability: Less likely to perform interactions when multiple players are in the room.
weakness: Will not hunt if there are multiple players in the same room as it.

name: Demon
description: The most aggressive ghost in the game. Attacks more often than any other ghost type.
ability: Can hunt at 70% sanity. Has a rare chance to hunt at any sanity level.
weakness: Crucifix range is increased to 5m. Smudging during a hunt only stops it for 60 seconds.

name: Yurei
description: A vengeful spirit that drains sanity rapidly when near players.
ability: Has a stronger effect on sanity. Can fully close doors (not just interact with them).
weakness: Using incense in the ghost's room will trap it there temporarily, stopping it from roaming.

name: Oni
description: A very active ghost that becomes more visible when players are nearby.
ability: More active when players are nearby. Can throw objects at great speed.
weakness: Being more active makes it easier to find and identify.

name: Yokai
description: A ghost that is attracted to human voices and becomes agitated when players talk nearby.
ability: Can hunt at 80% sanity when players are talking near it. Talking increases activity.
weakness: Can only hear players within 2m during a hunt, making it easier to hide.

name: Hantu
description: A ghost that moves faster in cold areas and produces visible freezing breath during hunts.
ability: Moves faster in colder rooms (up to 2.7m/s in freezing temps).
weakness: Moves slower in warmer rooms. Will never turn the breaker on.

name: Goryo
description: A ghost that shows itself only through D.O.T.S when no players are in the room.
ability: D.O.T.S evidence can only be seen through a video camera when no players are in the room.
weakness: Rarely roams far from its favorite room. Cannot change favorite rooms.

name: Myling
description: A very quiet ghost during hunts but produces more paranormal sounds through equipment.
ability: Produces louder paranormal sounds on the Parabolic Microphone.
weakness: Footsteps can only be heard within 12m during a hunt (vs normal 20m), making it stealthier.

name: Onryo
description: A spirit of vengeance that fears fire but becomes more dangerous when flames are extinguished.
ability: Has an increased chance to hunt when a flame is extinguished nearby.
weakness: Flames prevent hunts. Having a lit candle nearby will stop hunts.

name: The Twins
description: Two ghosts that can interact with the environment simultaneously in different locations.
ability: Either twin can initiate a hunt. Can interact in two places at once.
weakness: One twin is faster (10% faster), one is slower (10% slower). They won't interact at the same time in the same room.

name: Raiju
description: A ghost that harnesses electrical energy and becomes faster near active equipment.
ability: Moves faster near active electronic equipment during hunts. Can hunt at 65% sanity near electronics.
weakness: Constantly disrupts electronic equipment when nearby, making it easy to track.

name: Obake
description: A shapeshifting ghost that can change its appearance and alter its fingerprints.
ability: Has a chance to not leave fingerprints (25%). Can leave 6-fingered handprints as a tell.
weakness: Fingerprints disappear faster (60 seconds vs 120 seconds).

name: The Mimic
description: A deceptive ghost that can copy the traits and behaviors of other ghost types.
ability: Mimics other ghosts' abilities and behaviors. Always shows Ghost Orbs as fake evidence.
weakness: Always produces Ghost Orbs as a fourth piece of evidence, which can help identify it.
note: Shows Ghost Orbs as additional false evidence

name: Moroi
description: A cursed ghost that drains sanity through Spirit Box responses and becomes faster at low sanity.
ability: Curses players who get Spirit Box responses, causing double sanity drain. Moves faster at lower average sanity.
weakness: Incense blinds it for longer (7.5 seconds vs 6 seconds). Sanity medication removes the curse.

name: Deogen
description: An omniscient ghost that always knows where players are but moves very slowly when close.
ability: Always knows exact player locations. Can be identified through unique Spirit Box response.
weakness: Moves extremely slowly (0.4m/s) when close to a player, making it easy to loop.

name: Thaye
description: A ghost that ages and becomes weaker over time during an investigation.
ability: Starts very active and fast. Can hunt at 75% sanity when young.
weakness: Ages and becomes slower and less active the longer players are near. Old Thaye hunts at 15% sanity.
